channel.title: Can't attack NPC
channel.description: For some reason, i can't attack this npc. Black Demon, ID is 84. In npc.cfg, he has combat and hp set, and he's also in the NPCHandler.java. Is there any reason why i can't hit him? Thanks.

item.title: Can't attack NPC
item.dc:creator: @hitman2009 hitman2009
item.description:
@hitman2009 wrote:

[quote=“Skillapwnz, post:3, topic:308010”]Does it say this?

npc = 84	Black_Demon			172	800	20

if the 800 isnt there…

ex: 800 is the health

if there is no numer where the 800 is then u cant attack it. but it can attack you.[/quote]
Yeah it’s HP is set.

Read full topic

item.title: Can't attack NPC

item.description:

hitman2009:

For some reason, i can’t attack this npc. Black Demon, ID is 84. In npc.cfg, he has combat and hp set, and he’s also in the NPCHandler.java. Is there any reason why i can’t hit him? Thanks.

Try spawning him with the ID 677 instead of 84.
